definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
to understand what one is reading or watching
to pretend to understand when you don't
to pretend to understand when you don't
to not fully understand/to only partly understand
to not fully understand/to only partly understand

sentences.english: Kalec doesn't understand though. I've turn a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 卡雷克根本什么都不懂，我已经有了新的目标了。

sentences.english: You know that much about integrals.
sentences.chinese: 你们应该懂很多积分的。

sentences.english: Do you understand the moon's lonely?
Have experience or understand a foreign language is preferred .
sentences.chinese: 有经验或懂一门外语者优先。

sentences.english: He inculcates good manners in his children.
sentences.chinese: 他谆谆教导他的孩子们要懂规矩。

sentences.english: So that part is pretty clear, so hit Y for yes.
sentences.chinese: 这大家都懂的吧，所以敲入Y，也就是保存。

sentences.english: Arew, how come you know so much about computers?
When more than half of my life, experienced a lot of wind and rain, can understand this story.
sentences.chinese: 当我人生过半，经历了一番风雨后，才懂了这故事。

sentences.english: He is wise that hath wit enough for hellos own affairs.
sentences.chinese: 懂事情的道理者有足够的机智措置惩罚本身的工作。

sentences.english: He grows rose in the garden.
I know no more Spanish than I know Greek.
sentences.chinese: 我对西班牙语和希腊语同样不懂。

sentences.english: Sometimes people don't understand the promises that they're making when they make them.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，人们许诺时并没有真懂自己许的诺言。

sentences.english: Those people come to you agin. I said English but they don't understand it.
sentences.chinese: 那一些人又来找迩了，我说了英文可是她们罘懂。

sentences.english: No use asking you. You don't know anything about computers.
sentences.chinese: 问你也是白问，你又不懂电脑。

sentences.english: How you find "Smart" People Who know the Technology and the Business?
sentences.chinese: 如何网罗既懂技术又懂商业的“聪明”人才？

sentences.english: How you find "Smart" People Who know the Technology and the Business?
sentences.chinese: 如何网罗既懂技术又懂商业的“聪明”人才？

definition: to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
to understand what one is reading or watching
worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
unable to make sense of what one is looking at
lit. to know one and understand half (idiom); a smattering of knowledge/dilettante/amateur
clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
to understand (on hearing)/to catch (what is spoken)
to be proficient in/to master (a subject)
